+#  [2] http://openjdk.java.net/legal/assembly-exception.html
+#
+#  SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0
+##############################################################################
+
+ # if JDK_VERSION is 8
+ifeq (8, $(JDK_VERSION))
+ TEST_JAVA=$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/
+ ifneq (,$(findstring cmprssptrs,$(SPEC))) 
+  PATH_TO_LIB=$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/bin/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/lib/s390x/compressedrefs/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/lib/s390x/default/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/lib/s390x/compressedrefs
+  LIBJ9IFA29=/jre/lib/s390x/compressedrefs/libj9ifa29.so
+ else 
+  PATH_TO_LIB=$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/bin/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/lib/s390x:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/lib/s390x/default:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/lib/s390x
+  LIBJ9IFA29=/jre/lib/s390x/default/libj9ifa29.so
+ endif
+# if JDK_VERSION is 11, 14, 15 
+else
+ PATH_TO_LIB=$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/lib/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/lib/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/lib/compressedrefs:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/lib

nodes.bodyText: We need to copy the TEST_JDK_HOME  into $(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir and remove $(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir at the end of the test.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -569,4 +570,30 @@ SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-excepti
 		</subsets>
 		<disabled>https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/issues/3561</disabled>
 	</test>
+	<test>
+		<testCaseName>TestInvtest</testCaseName>
+		<command>cp -R $(TEST_JDK_HOME)/ $(REPORTDIR_NQ); \

nodes.bodyText:
$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/jre/lib/s390x is added twice in PATH_TO_LIB 
jre/lib/s390x/default/j9vm is missing

nodes.bodyText: Please check with the original test, I think jre/lib/s390x/default/j9vm  is not needed here

nodes.bodyText: Please copy into $(REPORTDIR_NQ)/<some_subdir> and remove $(REPORTDIR_NQ)/<some_subdir>. Otherwise, you may remove other useful info in REPORTDIR
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -569,4 +570,31 @@ SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-excepti
 		</subsets>

 	</test>
+	<test>
+		<testCaseName>TestInvtest</testCaseName>
+		<command>cp -R $(TEST_JDK_HOME)/ $(REPORTDIR_NQ)/; \

nodes.bodyText: Please do not use subdir  as a folder name. Name some meaningful. For example, testJava
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -569,4 +570,31 @@ SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-excepti
 		</subsets>
 		<disabled>https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/issues/3561</disabled>

+		<command>cp -R $(TEST_JDK_HOME)/ $(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir; \

nodes.bodyText: Please make s390  a variable. It changes based on SPEC
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+
+##############################################################################
+#  Copyright (c) 2020, 2020 IBM Corp. and others
+
+#  This program and the accompanying materials are made available under
+#  the terms of the Eclipse Public License 2.0 which accompanies this
+#  distribution and is available at https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0/
+#  or the Apache License, Version 2.0 which accompanies this distribution and
+#  is available at https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.
+#
+#  This Source Code may also be made available under the following
+#  Secondary Licenses when the conditions for such availability set
+#  forth in the Eclipse Public License, v. 2.0 are satisfied: GNU
+#  General Public License, version 2 with the GNU Classpath
+#  Exception [1] and GNU General Public License, version 2 with the
+#  OpenJDK Assembly Exception [2].
+#
+#  [1] https://www.gnu.org/software/classpath/license.html
+#  [2] http://openjdk.java.net/legal/assembly-exception.html
+#
+#  SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0
+##############################################################################
+
+ # if JDK_VERSION is 8
+ifeq (8, $(JDK_VERSION))
+ TEST_JAVA=$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/
+ ifneq (,$(findstring zos_390-64, $(SPEC)))
+  ifneq (,$(findstring cmprssptrs,$(SPEC))) 
+   PATH_TO_LIB=$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/bin/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/lib/s390x/compressedrefs/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/lib/s390x/compressedrefs
+   LIBJ9IFA29=/jre/lib/s390x/compressedrefs/libj9ifa29.so
+  else 
+   PATH_TO_LIB=$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/bin/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/lib/s390x/default/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/lib/s390x/default
+   LIBJ9IFA29=/jre/lib/s390x/default/libj9ifa29.so
+  endif
+ else
+  PATH_TO_LIB=$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/bin/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/lib/s390/default/j9vm:$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre/lib/s390/default

nodes.bodyText: Please use TEST_JAVA  instead of $(REPORTDIR_NQ)/subdir/jre. The same for the rest code.

nodes.bodyText: You can use ifneq (,$(findstring -64, $(SPEC))), so the code is more explicit.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+
+##############################################################################
+#  Copyright (c) 2020, 2020 IBM Corp. and others
+
+#  This program and the accompanying materials are made available under

+ifeq (8, $(JDK_VERSION))
+ TEST_JAVA=$(REPORTDIR_NQ)/testJava/jre/
+ ifneq (,$(findstring zos_390-64, $(SPEC)))

nodes.bodyText: Usually, we don't have the last / in a variable (i.e., TEST_JAVA). We add / when you use it like this: $(TEST_JAVA)/bin/j9vm. So it's more readable.
nodes.diffHunk:
